body_html:
@skye
./ configure

enable XLA, cuda, cuda 9.2, cudnn 7.1.5, and then NCCL setting

and then I tried 2 different

  1. just enter ( default NCCL 1.3 )
  2. install NCCL 2.2 and type 2.2

results were same hanging

I think this could be conflict with the geforce driver, I can try with newest driver, so I will try again and post ther result

body:
@skye 
./ configure

enable XLA, cuda, cuda 9.2, cudnn 7.1.5, and then NCCL setting 

and then I tried 2 different 
1. just enter ( default NCCL 1.3 )
2. install NCCL 2.2 and type 2.2

results were same hanging


I think this could be conflict with the geforce driver, I can try with newest driver, so I will try again and post ther result
